hello.text: Hello, Koishi. I think there is something wrong with me ?

how.text: Sleepy. Actually, I have felt drained out for ages now.

what.text: Well, it's this time of the month again. It is erupting.

check.text: {i}She sweats, but it looks like the droplets vaporize almost instantaneously. You touch her skin... Ouch ! She's burning{s}

mindread.text: You can feel the Yatagarasu. It looks like there is an eruption ongoing.

temperature.text: She is definitely hotter than usual, that's for sure. Now, you know exactly how cold she needs to get

operate.text: {i}You open up Utsuho and try to dislodge the Yatagarasu core from her body. Sadly, before you manage to complete the procedure, her heart stops...{s}

water.text: You drawn lead Utsuho atop the Geyser, with great pain. The Misty Lake is surprisingly frozen ! That's even better than expected.
